select * from release_welfare where authentiCationStatus in(1,3) and userId in(select userId from t_user_realname where companyName like #{userName}) and userId in(select userId from t_user_realname where contact=#{contact})
order by createTime limit #{pageLength}, #{pageSize}

select id, userId,position ,number,welfare,salary,education,experience,describeOne,introductoryAward,gender,age,isPublishContact, createTime,updateTime, workingAddress,termOfValidity from release_welfare where welfareStatus=1 and position=#{position} and userId in(select userId from t_user_realname where detailed like #{detailed}) order by updateTime desc limit #{pageLength}, #{pageSize}

mapper.update: update release_welfare set addressConsistency=#{addressConsistency}, workingAddress=#{workingAddress},updateTime=#{updateTime}, isPublishContact=#{isPublishContact},describeOne=#{describeOne}, email=#{email},welfareStatus=4 ,authentiCationStatus=1 ,termOfValidity=#{termOfValidity} where userId=#{userId} and id=#{id}
